mapper.select: SELECT display_info.id id, display_info.place_lot placeLot, display_info.place_street placeStreet, display_info.place_name placeName, display_info.tel placeTel, file_info.save_file_name fileName FROM display_info JOIN display_info_image ON display_info.id=display_info_image.display_info_id JOIN file_info ON display_info_image.file_id = file_info.id WHERE display_info.product_id = #{productId};
